mapper.update: update fix set dormi = #{dormi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, num = #{num,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, uName = #{uname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, msg = #{msg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pId = #{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, dormi, num, uName, type, msg, pId from fix
